mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_movie(movie_no, movie_title, movie_directer, movie_genre, movie_nation, movie_runningtime, movie_actor, movie_story, movie_poster, movie_sdate, movie_grade, movie_edate, movie_point, user_id) VALUES(seq_movie_no.nextval, #{movie_title}, #{movie_directer}, #{movie_genre}, #{movie_nation}, #{movie_runningtime}, #{movie_actor}, #{movie_story}, #{movie_poster}, #{movie_sdate}, #{movie_grade}, #{movie_edate}, #{movie_point}, #{userVO.user_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT movie_no, movie_title, movie_directer, movie_genre, movie_nation, movie_runningtime, movie_actor, movie_poster, to_char(movie_sdate,'YYYYMMDD') AS movie_sdate, movie_grade, to_char(movie_edate,'YYYYMMDD') AS movie_edate FROM m_movie

SELECT movie_no, movie_title, movie_directer, movie_genre, movie_nation, movie_runningtime, movie_actor, movie_poster, to_char(movie_sdate,'YYYYMMDD') AS movie_sdate, movie_grade, to_char(movie_edate,'YYYYMMDD') AS movie_edate FROM m_movie ORDER BY movie_count DESC
SELECT movie_no, movie_title FROM m_movie ORDER BY movie_title ASC
